code: export var CREATE_LESSON='CREATE_LESSON';export var DELETE_LESSON='DELETE_LESSON';export var FIND_ALL_LESSONS_FOR_MODULE='FIND_ALL_LESSONS_FOR_MODULE';export var UPDATE_LESSON='UPDATE_LESSON';export var createLesson=function createLesson(moduleId,lesson){return{title:'New Lesson',_id:new Date().getTime()+"",moduleId:moduleId,type:CREATE_LESSON,newLesson:lesson};};export var deleteLesson=function deleteLesson(lessonId){return{type:DELETE_LESSON,lessonId:lessonId};};export var findAllLessonsForModule=function findAllLessonsForModule(lessons){return{type:FIND_ALL_LESSONS_FOR_MODULE,lessons:lessons};};export var updateLesson=function updateLesson(lesson){return{title:lesson.title,type:UPDATE_LESSON,lesson:lesson};};export default{CREATE_LESSON:CREATE_LESSON,DELETE_LESSON:DELETE_LESSON,FIND_ALL_LESSONS_FOR_MODULE:FIND_ALL_LESSONS_FOR_MODULE,UPDATE_LESSON:UPDATE_LESSON,deleteLesson:deleteLesson,createLesson:createLesson,findAllLessonsForModule:findAllLessonsForModule,updateLesson:updateLesson};
